title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
lithid tadpole. He is being transported to Baldur's Gate along with an enormous elder brain.

Search for Grand Duke Ravengard in the city.

Grand Duke Ravengard is gone from Gortash's audience chamber. His whereabouts are currently unknown. We should search the city for signs of the duke.

Duke Ulder Ravengard is dead - but Mizora is still waiting to speak with us. We should return to her.

Mizora asked us to meet her in camp. She has an important proposal to make regarding Wyll's father, Grand
